title: Why do people even bother playing Warwick?
body: Everyone knows he's disgustingly OP at the moment, and he's going to be nerfed to the depths of hell before pre-season is over. Why even bother playing him when there's no point?

replies.body: Free wins for what? The wins don't even count for anything.

> Free wins for what? The wins don't even count for anything.

and in ranked?
Yea. In ranked your MMR still changes which will seed you better in S5

Because I like playing him?  I liked playing him before the jungle changes too.  Truthfully I'm going to be pissed if they nerf him and not the items that are the real problem.  Hell just make his ult not proc Challenger damage and cap Devourer.  Fixed.

He's mostly only OP because everyone that's not uber sustain (majority of other junglers) can't keep up with his early game farm. The emphasis on post-6 ganks has made his kit - completely in favour of post-6 ganks - rise to the top. I read that on PBE the starting magic damage on Devourer is going from 40 down to 25, so hopefully that should make him less oppressive than he is now and quell the whining.
Thats not why at all. He can one shot people with his goddamn ulti right now thanks to challenging smite. His sustain has nothing to do with the cancer that is on hit true damage.
He may see some tuning, but "nerfed to the depths of hell" he will not be.
i dont think he's op. he's just a really good jungler almost as if he was designed for the role
